data.lyric:
[ti:Joker (Live) (我是唱作人2第1期)]
[ar:张艺兴]
[al:Joker(Live)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Joker (Live) - 张艺兴 (LAY)
[00:02.28]词：李毅杰/张艺兴
[00:04.57]曲：张艺兴
[00:06.86]编曲：张艺兴
[00:09.14]音乐总监：谭伊哲@TYZ
[00:11.43]混音：林梦洋
[00:13.72]Why so serious
[00:18.55]I won't make a joke
[00:19.69]But you know I gotta get it
[00:21.33]气氛有点cold
[00:22.36]The show is gon be finished
[00:23.97]I won't make a joke
[00:25.04]But you know I gotta get it
[00:26.66]气氛有点cold
[00:28.83]从我的手提箱
[00:30.01]拿出我的旧西装
[00:31.57]绿色马甲别一朵花
[00:32.92]开放在游戏场
[00:34.17]I know
[00:34.54]太多的笑话
[00:35.40]But I never told anyone
[00:36.95]画上笑脸
[00:37.72]Not a killer but I kill the flow
[00:39.65]Everyday would be my holiday Babe
[00:42.19]你想要加入我的Squad
[00:43.78]No way save it
[00:44.86]Life is a book
[00:45.60]我在上面刻着五彩斑斓
[00:47.83]就不知不觉 找回天真烂漫
[00:50.99]You might think I'm crazy
[00:52.47]When I'm acting like a fool
[00:56.02]Life is more than just a drama
[00:58.58]But I am living thru
[01:01.17]听见我的脚步声
[01:03.65]滴滴嗒 跳着舞
[01:06.22]在花花世界 不分昼夜
[01:09.22]走着我的路
[01:12.01]Hold on Hold on
[01:12.92]我也有 我的梦想
[01:14.58]我想去 世界舞台
[01:16.03]华丽登场
[01:16.87]我还在尝试
[01:17.79]你却说
[01:18.52]我不配有这壮志
[01:19.82]不尊重我的一切
[01:21.08]嘲笑我期待的样子
[01:22.59]I just made your day
[01:23.82]我像是一个小丑
[01:25.10]只要你们能开心
[01:26.34]我就会微微笑 招手
[01:27.92]But why so serious
[01:29.08]奉上最迷人的舞姿
[01:30.58]在我的世界
[01:31.68]唱我人生冷暖故事
[01:33.26]You might think I'm crazy
[01:35.15]When I'm acting like a fool
[01:38.54]Life is more than just a drama
[01:41.18]But I am living thru
[01:43.94]听见我的脚步声
[01:46.22]滴滴嗒 跳着舞
[01:48.91]在花花世界 不分昼夜
[01:51.89]走着我的路
[01:53.95]Feel like Joker
[01:56.94]Stay sober
[01:59.27]I won't play no poker
[02:02.60]Not funny but you gotta make a smile
[02:04.82]Like Joker
[02:07.66]Stay sober
[02:09.89]I won't play no poker
[02:13.27]Not funny but you gotta make a smile
